    IndicesRequest, IndicesRequest.Replaceable, HasContext, HasContextAndHeaders, HasHeaders, Streamable
    Deprecated. 
    use SearchRequest instead and set `size` to `0` and `terminate_after` to `1`

    @Deprecated
public class ExistsRequest
extends BroadcastRequest<ExistsRequest>
